BasicInfo.short: Seesmic provides social media management and collaboration tools that enable businesses to build and manage their brands online.

Products.name: Seesmic Desktop
Products.description: Say hello to your go-to desktop application. With Seesmic Desktop, over 80 of your favorite services are finally within reach. So go ahead,

Products.name: Seesmic for iPhone
Products.description: Update and view multiple social networks in one efficient and powerful application. Customized to your needs.

Products.name: Seesmic for Windows Phone 7
Products.description: Seesmic for Windows Phone 7 is the app fit for your needs: multiple Twitter accounts and Facebook support, all in a customized dashboard.

Products.name: Seesmic Web
Products.description: Seesmic Web is a Twitter client in-browser created by Loic Le Meur, Founder and CEO of Seesmic.

Products.name: Seesmic
Products.description: seesmic will integrate with Skype, Twitter, YouTube, Facebook, del.ici.ous, Joost and other sites.

Products.name: Seesmic Android
Products.description: Complete mobile management in the palm of your hand. Seesmic for Android is a feature-rich application, with intuitiveness at its core.

Products.name: Seesmic for Blackberry
Products.description: Put the power of Twitter and Salesforce Chatter in the palm of your hand with Seesmic's native application for BlackBerry.

CurrentTeam.title: Director, Product Management, Desktop and Web
